candidates.title: Release zcash_address 0.3.0, zcash_primitives 0.12.0 and zcash_proofs 0.12.0
candidates.body:
Upgrades to:
- `bs58 0.5`
- `incrementalmerkletree 0.4`
- `orchard 0.5`
Fixes #785

candidates.title: Consolidate sapling functionality in zcash_client_sqlite in a dedicated module.
Remove esk and ephemeral_key arguments from `parse_note_plaintext_ovk`
candidates.body:
Requires https://github.com/zcash/orchard/pull/396

Fixes #850

labels.name: S-waiting-on-review
labels.description: Status: Awaiting review from the assignee but also interested parties.

candidates.title: Return the empty memo when memo is not present.
candidates.body:
Memos may be absent for both sent and received notes in cases where only compact block information has been used to populate the wallet database. This fixes a potential crash in the case that we attempt to decode a SQLite `NULL` as a byte array.

Fixes #384

(cherry picked from commit d99b4d4d6ec1126447159ffe649a3edac2f322d5)

candidates.title: Bump MSRV for `zcash_primitives` and dependents to 1.65
candidates.body: This corresponds to an MSRV of `n - 4`, in terms of previous analysis from #759.

candidates.title: zcash_history: Migrate to `primitive-types 0.12`
candidates.body: We also disable the default `std` feature, to remove transitive dependencies we don't use.

candidates.title: Pin winnow dependency to avoid MRSV break.
`zcash_client_backend 0.9.0`, `zcash_client_sqlite 0.7.0`
candidates.body: Closes #1092.

candidates.title: Migrate to `secp256k1 0.26`, `hdwallet 0.4`
candidates.body: Closes zcash/librustzcash#823.

candidates.title: `zcash_address 0.2.1`
candidates.body: This is just so we don't have two `bech32` versions in `zcashd`.

candidates.title: `zcash_primitives 0.11.0`, `zcash_proofs 0.11.0`, `zcash_client_backend 0.8.0`, `zcash_client_sqlite 0.6.0`
candidates.body: Closes #765.

candidates.title: Bump `tempfile` to 3.5.0 to mitigate RUSTSEC-2023-0018…
candidates.body:
See https://rustsec.org/advisories/RUSTSEC-2023-0018

This is resolves one of multiple audit failures reported in #816

candidates.title: Use proptest instead of quickcheck for zcash_history tests.
candidates.body:
Part of #757; resolves duplicate `rand-core` dependencies.

Best viewed ignoring whitespace changes.

candidates.title: zcash_primitives: Downgrade to `bip0039 0.10`
candidates.body: `bip0039 0.11` switched from language function arguments to a generic parameter. We aren't ready to migrate to this yet.

candidates.title: Upgrade to redjubjub 0.7.0
candidates.body:
This removes our reliance on the following out-of-date transitive dependencies that are duplicative of more recent versions of crates we depend on:
- bls12_381 v0.7
- ff v0.12
- group v0.12
- jubjub v0.9
- pasta_curves v0.4
- reddsa v0.3

candidates.title: zcash_note_encryption: remove `recipient` parameter from `Domain::note_plaintext_bytes`
candidates.body: This then updates the `zcash_note_encryption` crate for a version 0.3.0 release.

candidates.title: Update dependencies to reflect changes in ff 0.13
Temporarily re-expose ability to construct invalid Sapling bundles
candidates.body: Until zcash/zcash#6397 is closed, this ability is needed by `zcashd` for crossing the FFI.

candidates.title: Upgrade `zcash_primitives` to use updated `incrementalmerkletree` types.

labels.name: S-waiting-on-review
labels.description: Status: Awaiting review from the assignee but also interested parties.

candidates.body:
These changes are in preparation for the upcoming `incrementalmerkletree` crate release.

This PR is best reviewed commit-by-commit.

candidates.title: Pin the `inferno` transitive dependency to avoid MSRV errors.
`zcash_primitives 0.10.0`, `zcash_proofs 0.10.0`, `zcash_client_backend 0.7.0`, `zcash_client_sqlite 0.5.0`
candidates.body:
Closes #764.
Closes #719.

candidates.title: Bump MSRV for `zcash_primitives` and dependents to 1.60
candidates.body:
The MSRVs of the component crates are left as-is, partly because our dependencies don't require us to bump them, and partly because those crates have no pending changes and are relatively stable. We also plan to split the component crates out into a separate repository, where it will be easier to have a separate MSRV.

Closes zcash/librustzcash#759.

candidates.title: Sapling API changes
candidates.body: Closes #454.

candidates.title: Fix transparent balance error when the wallet is empty.
candidates.body: Fixes #724
